dev.b3nedikt.restring.repository

Class SharedPrefsStringRepository

  • dev.b3nedikt.restring.repository.SharedPrefsStringRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MutableStringRepository, StringRepository

    public class SharedPrefsStringRepository
implements MutableStringRepository

    A interface MutableStringRepository that stores resources persistently in the SharedPreferences

    See Also:
    interface MutableStringRepository, SharedPreferences

    • Field Detail

      • Companion

        public static dev.b3nedikt.restring.repository.SharedPrefsStringRepository.Companion Companion
        Deprecated. 

    • Constructor Detail

      • SharedPrefsStringRepository

        public SharedPrefsStringRepository(@NotNull
                                   kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.lang.String,? extends android.content.SharedPreferences> sharedPreferencesProvider)

        A interface MutableStringRepository that stores resources persistently in the SharedPreferences

        Parameters:
        sharedPreferencesProvider - creates a new shared preference instance with the givenname. Note that this class constructs multiple instances of the shared preferences which maybe accessed in parallel! In short a implementation of this function should return a differentshared preference instance for each name, but will only get called once for a given name.
        See Also:
        interface MutableStringRepository, SharedPreferences

    • Method Detail

      • getSupportedLocales

        @NotNull
public java.util.Set<java.util.Locale> getSupportedLocales()

        The Locales supported by the repository, Restring will only replace strings of Locales in this set. Meaning if strings contains a string resource, but this string resource does belong to a Locale not in the supportedLocales, it will get used by Restring.

        See Also:
        Locale, Locale, strings, Locale, supportedLocales

      • getStrings

        @NotNull
public java.util.Map<java.util.Locale,java.util.Map> getStrings()

        The string resources with their Locale as key and maps of string resource names to their resource value as value.

        See Also:
        Locale

      • getQuantityStrings

        @NotNull
public java.util.Map<java.util.Locale,java.util.Map> getQuantityStrings()

        The quantity string resources with their Locale as key and maps of string resource names to their resource value as value.

        See Also:
        Locale

      • getStringArrays

        @NotNull
public java.util.Map<java.util.Locale,java.util.Map> getStringArrays()

        The string array resources with their Locale as key and maps of string resource names to their resource value as value.

        See Also:
        Locale
